item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 8, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Italy doubles tax for wealthy foreigners
2. Ukraine presses on with surprise military incursion into Russia
3. Stephen Schwarzman runs into newt headache at his £80mn UK estate
4. Reeves to announce plans to create ‘Canadian-style’ pension model
5. [Opinion] Rising rates of cancer in young people prompt hunt for environmental culprit
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 8, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
